name: Bristol Young Professionals
description: A social networking group for young professionals from all industries. Hosting monthly drinks events and other social activities since 2005.
details: Bristol Young Professionals (BYP) is a casual networking group for young people from a wide variety of professions. BYP hosts a drinks event every first Thursday of the month, at a different location, for relaxed networking and socialising. We also organise other monthly social events. There are no set introductions or speeches - it's more about socialising and having a chance to meet likeminded people in a friendly and non-pressured environment.

time.frequency: The first Thursday of the month

cost.details: Free to attend. Drinks are pay-as-you-go, often with special deals at the venue. Sponsored events may include free drinks tokens.

booking.details: Just turn up! Check the website for the latest venue information and any special arrangements.
